argument.name: controlName
argument.description: The control to set focus on.

argument.name: repeatingSectionRowNumber
argument.description: Logical row number, must be specified if using a repeating section control.

page.description: Sets focus to a specified control on the dialog.
page.discussion: Sets focus to a specified control on the dialog. If the control is inside a tab or accordion, gives focus to the appropriate tab/accordion pane. If the control is in a Repeating Section, you must also specify the logical row number.
